name: ZombieVillage Level 1 Demo Part 2
description:
Playable level 1 part 2 for testing our new rpg adventure game in an early stage. Please, make sure to download part1  ( ZombieVillage.exe and ZombieVillage-1a.bin ) before downloading this part( ZombieVillage-1b.bin )  then download  part 3 ( ZombieVillage-1c.bin ), put them in the same folder and run ZombieVillage.exe to setup.

#rpg #adventure #rpgadventure 

Please share your experiences with us at info@bulukod.com so that we can improve the game.
